mapper.sql: empno, ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno
mapper.insert:
insert into emp (ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno) values
(#{item.ename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.job,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mgr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.hiredate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.sal,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.comm,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.deptno,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into emp (ename, job, mgr, hiredate, sal, comm, deptno) values
(#{item.ename},#{item.job},#{item.mgr},#{item.hiredate},#{item.sal},#{item.comm},#{item.deptno})
